entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump This is not a TV show where you get reviews! This is a coronavirus pandemic that is crippling our nation because YOU eliminated the protections President @BarackObama had in place and because YOU called it a hoax! 68,465 Americans are DEAD because of your genocidal incompetence!
